SEED = 42
EARLY_STOP_NUM = 50

source.c9af85e3:
np.random.seed(SEED)
X = np.random.rand(DATA_NUM, COL_NUM) - 0.5
y = 3*X[:, 0]**2 + 0.05 * np.random.randn(DATA_NUM) - 2*X[:, 1]*2 + 3*X[:, 2]*np.random.randn(DATA_NUM)

new_data = np.append(X,y.reshape(-1,1),axis=1)
df = pd.DataFrame(new_data)
